requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

Recommended:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
